recipesJson.name: Show Me Your Melons v1.1
recipesJson.author: MrColtux
recipesJson.description: A refreshing summer mix of melons and mint. Feel free to adjust the spearmint and koolada to your personal preferences.

reviews.text: Delicious! I love spearmint and this really adds a lot to the flavor, nice!

I'm rating this 5 stars with the disclaimer that I did not mix this exactly. Some subs were required. However, it is a damn fine concept and I appreciate the share. I will comment with my subs, but I really enjoyed the INW Melon/Cucumber/Spearmint pairing.
